TopicTitle: If you could add one more building... I'd love a dock.

Articles.Content:
For me with the recent announcements about 1.05 I think a dock with the option of launching a water based vessel when you finish design would be awesome.

Personally I think it would also add nicely to the outbuildings. Anybody agree and/or have suggestions for other buildings at the main KSP launch site?

Although SQUAD would never add anything like that, I do agree, it would be nice... But for now an easier way to put things in the water is with the HyperEdit ship lander presets.

I would like to see a way to launch from the Helipad atop the VAB, though mods do that already.

What about a rover track?
More tracks/road would be nice and KerbinSide adds a lot of that stuff.
Yeah, a dock or maybe a slipway would be welcome. Rolling boats all the way down the runway and into the water gets tedious.

An Astronaut training facility: when you have astronauts who have been in space before, they can train others to become at the same level as them.

But that will requires time and money to train them, just to keep it fair.

What about a rover track?

All of KSC is a rover track. If you want to do durability and stability testing, the crawlerway and launchpad work beautifully.

Happy landings!

We probably won't see a dock any time soon, which is a shame as it'd make it easier to recreate SpaceX style barge low velocity impacts landings.

Until then I'll keep doing this.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

An Astronaut training facility: when you have astronauts who have been in space before, they can train others to become at the same level as them.

But that will requires time and money to train them, just to keep it fair.

Roverdude's UKS has an academy part that will let you train Kerbals based on the XP of the highest ranked kerbal of their classification on the ship.(ie pilots train pilots, engineers train engineers, etc)

Max training is based on location:

Kerbin: 1 star

Space: 2 stars

Non-kerbin body: 3 stars

It gives the trained Kerbal the same experience as the training kerbal subject to the above cap(except flags, it will only give 'landed' XP)

I have one landed on Minmus as part of a colony, so now I should only need to stop by with newly rescued Kerbals instead of taking them through the entire training process(Mun flag, Minmus flag, Kerbol fly-by).
Or even better.. Let us add our own buildings and even let us decide where on the planet the space center should be.
This suggestion for the game's development has been moved to Suggetions & Development Discussions.

We probably won't see a dock any time soon, which is a shame as it'd make it easier to recreate SpaceX style barge low velocity impacts landings.

Until then I'll keep doing this.

http://imgur.com/a/C16eu

Load it in the SPH, and use the runway.
This (and the inevitable adding of a boat launching dock if there isn't one already) is just another reason to install KerbinSide when 1.1 comes out and I can use all the memory in my computer.

Load it in the SPH, and use the runway.
sal_vager's method is pretty neat actually, it's a much shorter roll from the launchpad compared to having to trundle the whole length of the runway into the ocean.

Load it in the SPH, and use the runway.

The runways start position is a long way from the shore, so no, I won't be doing that.
